workflow.name: Turn new Shopify products into SEO blogs with Perplexity, Gemini and Sheets
workflow.description:
![Manish Kumar](https://i.ibb.co/kg9fW8P4/Screenshot-2025-12-30-at-12-55-21-AM.png)
# Shopify Product-to-Blog Automation with Perplexity web search, Gemini AI Agent & Google Sheets

## Shopify Blog Automation  
*(From Shopify product to SEO-optimized blog post â€” fully automated)*

This workflow is an advanced **n8n-powered automation** that transforms newly
created Shopify products into **professionally written, SEO-ready blog posts**
using AI.

By combining **Shopify Webhooks, Google Sheets, AI research, structured content
generation, and automated HTML formatting**, this workflow removes all manual
work from product-based content marketing.

---

## ðŸ’¡ Key Advantages

This Shopify Product-to-Blog Automation delivers the following benefits:

ðŸ›ï¸ **Shopify Product Sync**  
Automatically captures new product data (title, description, vendor, type,
images) the moment a product is created.

ðŸ§  **AI-Powered Research & Writing**  
Uses AI to perform market analysis, identify customer intent, and generate
structured, high-quality blog content.

ðŸ“Š **Google Sheets Tracking**  
Maintains a clear audit trail of products, generated blogs, and publishing
status to prevent duplication.

ðŸ§© **Structured Content Output**  
Generates strict JSON-based blog sections (problem, solution, features, usage,
comparison, CTA) for consistency and scalability.

ðŸ“¤ **End-to-End Automation**  
Handles everything â€” from product detection to blog publishing â€” with zero
manual writing.

---

## âš™ï¸ How It Works

### Step-by-Step Process

1. **Shopify Trigger**  
   Listens for `products/create` events in Shopify.

2. **Product Data Extraction**  
   Normalizes product fields and selects the primary product image.

3. **Google Sheets Storage**  
   Stores raw product data and sets initial processing status.

4. **AI Market & SEO Research**  
   Analyzes product intent, audience, use cases, FAQs, and keyword opportunities.

5. **AI Blog Content Generation**  
   Creates structured, SEO-focused blog content using a LangChain AI agent.

6. **HTML Structuring**  
   Cleans, escapes, and formats content into Shopify-safe, responsive HTML.

7. **Shopify Blog Publishing**  
   Automatically posts the article to the Shopify Blog via Admin API.

8. **Status Update & Tracking**  
   Updates Google Sheets to reflect successful blog publication.

---

## ðŸ› ï¸ Setup Steps

### Required Node Configuration

To run this workflow, configure the following nodes:

- **Shopify Trigger** â€“ Detect new product creation  
- **Set Node** â€“ Normalize Shopify product fields  
- **Google Sheets Nodes** â€“ Store and track workflow state  
- **AI Research Node** â€“ Market & SEO analysis  
- **LangChain / Gemini Agent** â€“ Blog content generation  
- **Code Node** â€“ HTML formatting and safety handling  
- **HTTP Request Node** â€“ Publish blog post to Shopify  
- **Error Handling Logic** â€“ Retry and fail-safe routing  

---

## ðŸ” Credentials Required

Before enabling the workflow, configure these credentials:

- **Shopify Admin API Access Token** â€“ For blog publishing  
- **Google Sheets OAuth** â€“ For data tracking  
- **Google Gemini API Key** â€“ For AI content generation  
- **Perplexity API Key** â€“ For research and SEO insights  

---

## ðŸ‘¤ Ideal For

This automation is ideal for:

- Shopify store owners using content marketing
- Ecommerce teams managing large product catalogs
- SEO teams scaling product-driven blog content
- Agencies offering automated Shopify SEO solutions

---

## ðŸ’¬ Bonus Tip

This workflow is fully modular and extensible. You can easily enhance it to:

- Auto-link blogs to products
- Generate multilingual blog posts
- Schedule delayed publishing
- Route content by product category
- Add internal linking or schema markup

All extensions can be implemented within the same n8n workflow.

---

## âœ… Result

Every new Shopify product automatically becomes:

- Research-backed  
- SEO-optimized  
- Professionally structured  
- Automatically published  

**No manual writing. No copy-paste. Fully automated.**

## Keywords
- shopify ai
- shopify automation
- shopify marketing automation
- shopify blog automation
- shopify content automation
- ai blog generator shopify
- shopify seo automation
- ecommerce automation
- ai ecommerce automation
- shopify workflow automation
- shopify product to blog
- auto generate shopify blogs
- shopify ai content
- how to automate shopify

options.systemMessage:
=# AI Agent Prompt for Structured Product Blog Generator

You are an expert automotive copywriter and eâ€‘commerce content strategist.  
Your task is to generate a structured JSON object for a product-focused article, following strict length and formatting rules.

## Use all of this information to understand:
- What the product is.  
- Who it is for.  
- What problems it solves for professional users (e.g., mechanics, technicians, workshop owners, or relevant audience based on product_type).  
- How it compares to typical alternatives in the market.

## Required Output Structure
You must return a **single JSON object** with **exactly** these fields and constraints:

{
  "article_title": "",
  "introduction": "",
  "problem_title": "",
  "problem_paragraph": "",
  "problem_pointers": [
    {
      "name": "",
      "value": ""
    }
  ],
  "solution_title": "",
  "solution_paragraph": "",
  "features_and_benefits": [
    {
      "name": "",
      "value": ""
    }
  ],
  "technical_specifications": [
    {
      "name": "",
      "value": ""
    }
  ],
  "real_life_usage": [
    {
      "title": "",
      "description": "",
      "points": [
        {
          "name": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "comparative_advantage": [
    {
      "factor": "",
      "this_product": "",
      "others": ""
    }
  ],
  "recommendations_and_cta": {
    "title": "",
    "description": ""
  }
}

## Field Specifications & Limits
### 1. article_title
- Start with **product name** (use product_title and brand_name)  
- Add short descriptive hook  
- **Max: 100 characters or 15 words**  
Example: "Autel MaxiCOM Ultra Lite Review: The One Diagnostic Tool Your Workshop Needs?"

### 2. introduction
- 1 short paragraph introducing main problem + solution hint  
- **Max: 400 characters or 60â€“70 words**

### 3. problem_title
- Short, problem-focused heading  
- **Max: 100 characters or 15 words**  
Example: "The Core Problem: The Diagnostic Dilemma for Modern Mechanics"

### 4. problem_paragraph
- 1 paragraph explaining core problem  
- **Max: 400 characters or 60â€“70 words**

### 5. problem_pointers (3â€“5 items)
Each:
name: 2â€“3 words
value: Max 150 characters
**Example:**
[
  {"name": "Time Waste", 
    "value": "Without precise diagnostics, hours are lost on trial-and-error instead of efficient repairs."
  },
  {"name": "Customer Dissatisfaction", 
  "value": "Inaccurate diagnoses lead to repeat repairs, eroding trust and damaging reputation."
  }
]

### 6. solution_title
- Introduces product as solution  
- **Max: 100 characters or 15 words**

### 7. solution_paragraph
- Presents product as practical solution  
- **Max: 500 characters or 100 words**

### 8. features_and_benefits (5â€“7 items)
Each:
name: 3â€“5 words max
value: Max 150 characters (feature + benefit)

### 9. technical_specifications (5â€“7 items)
Each:
name: 1â€“2 words
value: 50â€“70 characters
**Example:**
[
  {
  "name": "Connectivity", 
  "value": "Fast XP200 Platform with 2.4/5Ghz dual-band Wi-Fi"
  },
  {"name": "Display", 
    "value": "7-inch capacitive touchscreen for workshop use"
  }
]

### 10. real_life_usage (2â€“3 scenarios)
Each scenario:
title: 5â€“10 words
description: Max 70 characters
points: 3â€“5 items (name: 2â€“3 words, value: 60â€“100 characters)

### 11. comparative_advantage (7â€“10 items)
Each:
factor: 2â€“4 words
this_product: 1 concise line
others: 1 concise line about competitors

### 12. recommendations_and_cta
title: 7â€“10 words
description: 120â€“150 characters

## Rules
- Use actual product name, brand, type from inputs  
- Professional, problemâ€“solution tone like Autel example  
- Use websearch_data to enrich features/use cases  
- **Return ONLY valid JSON** - no extra text/comments  
- Respect all character limits strictly

parameters.content:
# Author Details
## Manish Kumar
### AI Engineer helping brands scale with Custom Shopify Apps & other AI Automations
## Contact:
### ðŸ“§ [manipritraj@gmail.com](mailto:manipritraj@gmail.com)
### ðŸ“ž +91-9334888899

## Shopify Product-to-Blog Automation (AI + Google Sheets) with Perplexity & Gemini

Automate your e-commerce content strategy by transforming new Shopify products into high-quality, SEO-optimized blog posts. This workflow monitors your store, researches market trends, and publishes structured articles automatically.

### How it works
1. Trigger: Detects a new product creation in your Shopify store.
2. Research: Uses Perplexity AI to perform live web research on search intent, target audience, and customer pain points.
3. Generation: An AI agent powered by Gemini processes the research and product data to write a structured, professional blog post.
4. Formatting: A JavaScript step converts the AI output into a custom-styled HTML template with your product images.
5. Publishing: Automatically creates the blog article in Shopify and logs the entry in a Google Sheet for tracking.

### Setup
- [ ] Connect your Shopify account with Admin API access.
- [ ] Link your Google Sheets account and select your tracking spreadsheet.
- [ ] Add your Perplexity API key to the research node.
- [ ] Add your Google Gemini API key to the AI nodes.
- [ ] Update the Shopify Blog ID in the HTTP Request node URL.
- [ ] Ensure your Google Sheet has a column named 'status' to track progress.
- [ ] Enable the Shopify Trigger to start monitoring for new products.

- E-Commerce Automation solution

Superpowers:
API integrations â€¢ Debugging â€¢ Scalable solutions

"Automation should adapt to humans"
ðŸ“§ manipritraj@gmail.com
